body_html: Similarly, being able to set a time offset and duration would be nice (i.e. ffmpeg -ss 00:03:00 and -t 60 for being able to only decode parts of longer movies and audio files, so you can work through a folder of files in reasonable segments, but maybe that is best to think about in a separate issue.
body_text: Similarly, being able to set a time offset and duration would be nice (i.e. ffmpeg -ss 00:03:00 and -t 60 for being able to only decode parts of longer movies and audio files, so you can work through a folder of files in reasonable segments, but maybe that is best to think about in a separate issue.
body: Similarly, being able to set a time offset and duration would be nice (i.e. ffmpeg `-ss 00:03:00` and `-t 60` for being able to only decode parts of longer movies and audio files, so you can work through a folder of files in reasonable segments, but maybe that is best to think about in a separate issue.
